## Projects

Project loader table data is extracted from `RAProjects` files. The following variable mappings are used:

| Loader Table        | Source Data        |
|---------------------|--------------------|
| user_pj_code        | ProjectCode        |
| project_name        | ProjectName        |
| project_description | ProjectDescription |
| start_date          | ProjectStartDate   |
| stop_date           | ProjectEndDate     |

The project start and stop dates are converted from date-time formats to date formats (dropping the time). Values are checked to ensure they are reasonable.

```{r}
in_path <- '/var/data/curation/vegbank/'
out_path <- 'data/loader-tables/projectLT.csv'
project_loader(in_path, out_path)
```
